main event: A witness observed a round white and light blue object that rapidly descended and hovered before traveling southeast, eventually disappearing southwest.
interesting points: The object hovered for a brief moment before moving; it dropped and flowed below the clouds; it was observed for 1-2 minutes; the sighting does not conform to criteria for departing aircraft from Boston; insufficient data is available to support its identification.
sighted object: one round white and light blue object
